thread.title: Prodways say the 3D printing market needs multiple technologies
thread.title_full: Prodways say the 3D printing market needs multiple technologies

title: Prodways say the 3D printing market needs multiple technologies
text:
Prodways say the 3D printing market needs multiple technologies 8 October 2015 Expand Arnaud Guedou from Prodways tells TCT about the additive manufacturing company's plans to become the third biggest 3D technology provider in the world and why they're keen to work with others to bring innovation to the marketplace. Arnaud also gives his thoughts on the industry as a whole and how the global market needs multiple solutions to answer specific applications. 
To keep up-to-date on all the latest videos from TCT Show make sure you subscribe to our YouTube channel . Tags
